mapper.insert: insert into bd_chosen_read (readid, readman, readtime, chosenid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag) values (#{readid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chosenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_chosen_read set readman = #{readman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, readtime = #{readtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chosenid = #{chosenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where readid = #{readid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select readid, readman, date_format(readtime, '%Y/%m/%d') readtime, chosenid, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_chosen_read where readid = #{readid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select readid, readman, date_format(readtime, '%Y/%m/%d') readtime, chosenid, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_chosen_read
